sentence.Network_en: The district is under consideration for designation as a conservation area.
sentence.Network_cn: 正在考虑将这个地区指定为保护区。

sentence.Network_en: The designation of special marine reserves and marine sanctuaries shall be subject to the State Council for approval.
sentence.Network_cn: 海洋特别保护区、海上自然保护区的确定,须经国务院批准.

sentence.Network_en: The women's liberation movement adopted the designation as its own.
sentence.Network_cn: 妇女解放运动采用了这个称呼.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (in the sense 'the action of marking'): from Latin designatio(n-), from the verb designare (see designate)

entry.tran: 名称;称号;标示;指定;命名;指派
entry.def: A designation is a description, name, or title that is given to someone or something. Designation is the fact of giving that description, name, or title.

example.ex: ...a level four alert, a designation reserved for very serious incidents.
example.tran: 用于标示非常严重事件的第四级警戒

example.ex: ...the designation of Madrid as European City of Culture 1992.
example.tran: 马德里被命名为 1992 年度的欧洲文化之城

means.word_mean: 1. identifying word or words by which someone or something is called and classified or distinguished from others
2. the act of putting a person into a non-elective position;

sentences.sentence: "the appointment had to be approved by the whole committee"

means.word_mean: 3. the act of designating or identifying something

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Certainly, MPI should be a designation of last resort.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =mark,表示"记号,信号,标志"; 2. 签署

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有意义的;重大的,重要的
stems_affixes.word_buile: significance[[n.意义,含义;重要性,重要的]]→adj.有意义的;重大的,重要的
in内部+sign记号,信号,标志+ia状态→内部标志

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分配,指派;[指定的]作业,[分派的]任务
stems_affixes.word_buile: assign派给,分配+ment表名词→n.分配,指派;[指定的]作业,[分派的]任务
consign[v.托运,托人看管]+ment表名词→n.托运,寄售
de加强+sign记号→做好记号→设计
designate[v.指明,指出;任命,指派]+ion表名词→designation指定

stems_affixes.value_cn: 旗, 军舰旗, 军旗, 徽章,舰旗[船上表示所属国家的旗帜]
stems_affixes.word_buile: en内部+sign记号,信号,标志→内部标志
resign[v.辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从]+ation表名词→n.放弃,辞职,反抗
sign记号,信号,标志→n.符号；手势；征兆，迹象 v. 签名；作手势
sign记号,信号,标志+al→n.信号,暗号 v.发信号,用信号通知
sign记号,信号,标志+ature表名词→记号的东西→签名
sign记号,信号,标志+et做记号→图章

stems_affixes.value_cn: 意义,含义;重要性,重要的
stems_affixes.word_buile: signifi=signify[v.表示,意味;要紧,有重要性]+cance→n.意义,含义;重要性,重要的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 派给,分配;选定,指定[时间,地点等]
stems_affixes.word_buile: as加强+sign签署→指定
de加强+sign记号→做好记号→设计
de加强+sign记号+ate表动词→指定记号→指定,指明
con共同+sign记号,信号,标志→共同做记号→把……委托给别人

stems_affixes.value_cn: 辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从
stems_affixes.word_buile: re回+sign签署→v.辞去,辞职,使听从[于],使顺从
sign记号,信号,标志→n.符号；手势；征兆，迹象 v. 签名；作手势
sign记号,信号,标志+al→n.信号,暗号 v.发信号,用信号通知

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使著名, 使显著, 使显眼, 向……发信号
stems_affixes.word_buile: signal信号+ize表动词→发信号
sign记号,信号,标志+et做记号→图章

stems_affixes.value_cn: 表示,意味;要紧,有重要性
stems_affixes.word_buile: sign记号,信号,标志+ify……化→用信号表示→象征
